name: WhatsAsenaDuplicated
description: WhatsAsena project - Makes it easy and fun to use WhatsApp. Worldâ€™s first UserBot made for WhatsApp.

ASENA_SESSION.description: Your private session code created with Qr.Js. Type your Asena Session here.

SUDO.description: Gives all privileges to the users. Example => 90xxx,0,90xxx,0,90xxx...

LANGUAGE.description: Bot language. Azerbaijani => az, English => en, Turkish => tr, Malayalam => ml, Hindi => HI, Indonesian => ID, Spanish => ES, Portuguese => pt, Russian => ru

AUTO_BIO.description: Set true to automatically add date and time to your biography.

FULL_EVA.description: Turn your account into a chatbot!

NO_LOG.description: Set true if you don't want to see error logs.

SEND_READ.description: Set true if you want to send read receipts (seen).

HEROKU.description: Set true if running on Heroku.

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable mute message. Use => default to reset.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose the chats where the bot should not work. Example: 905xxxx && 905xxxx-1xxx or 905xxxx,905xxx...

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable unmute message. Use => default to reset.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable block message. Use => default to reset.

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable unblock message. Use => default to reset.

WORK_TYPE.description: WhatsAsena working type. If set to 'public', everyone can use the bot. If 'private', only you can use the bot.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Heroku App Name. Must be the same as the actual Heroku app name!

DEBUG.description: For developers => all, info, warn, fatal, error, debug, off

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable alive message. Use => default to reset.

BAN_MESSAGE.description: Customizable ban message. Use => default to reset.

ADD_MESSAGE.description: Customizable add message. Use => default to reset.

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: Customizable kickme message. Use => default to reset.

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable promote message. Use => default to reset.

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable demote message. Use => default to reset.

AFK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable AFK (away from keyboard) message. Use => default to reset.

GAN_IMAGE.description: Provide image link for GAN Style plugin.

NO_ONLINE.description: Type true if you don't want to appear online.
